title: Lunar Flare
summaries: The Lunar Flare is a Hardmode, post-Moon Lord magic weapon that summons three projectiles that rain down from above the game screen per every use. These projectiles appear as turquoise streaks and explode upon impact with an enemy or solid block. However, the Lunar Flare's projectiles are also capable of passing through blocks if the cursor is also within solid blocks, and will explode upon reaching the cursor's altitude or upon hitting enemies in these instances. The Lunar Flare has a 2/9 (22.22%) chance to be dropped from the Moon Lord.

statistics.Sell: 10 GC
